description: This file is a Python script that sets up a knowledge base using a PDF document, configures a database connection, and initializes an agent for querying the knowledge base, including loading data and printing a response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and handles user queries.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads content from a PDF URL.

classes.name: SingleStore
classes.description: A vector database implementation for SingleStore.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base data, with an option to recreate the database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent’s response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
